{{distinguish|Classic 0.27 SURVIVAL TEST}}

'''Classic 0.28''' refers to three internal development versions made by [[Notch]] made during [[Survival Test]]. They are versioned under "0.27", but are indeed early versions of 0.28.

* [[Sheep]] are shown, and drop red cloth.

== Bleached Sheep (October 25, 2009) ==
{{Unreleased version|section=1}}
'''[https://web.archive.org/web/20091029030546/http://notch.tumblr.com/post/223140045/the-sheep-in-action-considering-making-them-drop Word of Notch post];''' '''[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFCy5mx84V0&index=16 Youtube Video]'''
* Sheep now drop white cloth.

== Creative (October 26, 2009) ==
{{Unreleased version|section=1}}
'''[http://web.archive.org/web/20110302153511/http://notch.tumblr.com/post/224162496/progress-update-on-creative-mode-merge Word of Notch post]'''
* Reimplemented Creative mode.
** Only works in singleplayer.
** Has higher fps than Survival.
